question: Which organisation enforces the provisions of the World Anti-Doping Code?
option4: UNESCO International Convention against Doping in Sport
answer: UNESCO International Convention against Doping in Sport
explanation: The provisions of the World Anti-Doping Code are enforced by the UNESCO International Convention against Doping in Sport. It is a multilateral UNESCO Treaty by which states agree to adopt national measures to prevent and eliminate drug doping in sport. When was the UNESCO International Convention against Doping in Sport adopted?
